member.name: E:ConsoleControl.ConsoleControl.LineEntered
member.summary: This event is raised whenever text is entered into the console control

member.name: P:ConsoleControl.ConsoleControl.ShowCursor
member.summary: Gets or Sets a value indicating whether the console should show the cursor

member.name: P:ConsoleControl.ConsoleControl.AllowInput
member.summary: Gets or Sets a value indicating whether the console should allow keyboard input

member.name: P:ConsoleControl.ConsoleControl.EchoInput
member.summary: Gets or Sets a value indicating whether the console should echo any input it receives.

member.name: P:ConsoleControl.ConsoleControl.CursorType
member.summary: Gets or Sets the current cursor type.

member.name: P:ConsoleControl.ConsoleControl.ConsoleBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets the background color of the console. Default is Black.

member.name: P:ConsoleControl.ConsoleControl.ConsoleForegroundColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets the foreground color of the console. Default is light gray.

member.name: M:ConsoleControl.ConsoleControl.GetCursorPosition

member.summary: Writes a newline (carriage return) to the console.
